title: Consider making bash work better with VS and VS Code
body: It will be convenient if VS and VS Code can debug python and C/C++ console programs with python and gcc/g++ in WSL.

comments.body: Also please support this directly and not via the indirect route over ssh that is described in this blog post: https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/vcblog/2017/02/22/learn-c-concepts-with-visual-studio-and-the-wsl/
